wiki_flags¶

wiki_flags.constructpageurl(pagename)¶

Given a natural-text page name, e.g ‘Flag of Thailand’, returns a url pointing to a wikipedia page (if one exists) for that page name

Parameters

pagename (String) – The name of a wikipedia page

Returns

The url of a wikipedia page with the name pagename

Return type

String

wiki_flags.filterresults(searchresults)¶

Given a list of search results, select all those likely to be for flags or coats of arms

Parameters

searchresults ([String]) – A list of Strings represnting individual search results

Returns

A list of those results that contained the substrings ‘flag’ or ‘coat of arms’ (case insensitive)

Return type

[String]

wiki_flags.getdisambiguationlinks(pagename)¶

Given a wikipedia page name corresponding to a disambiguation page, returns all of the pages it branches to.

Parameters

pagename (String) – The name of a wikipedia page

Returns

A list of page names, corresponding to every page that the disambiguation suggests as corresponding to the pagename

Return type

[String]

wiki_flags.getflagpage(term, kind='Flag')¶

Returns the wikipedia page corresponding to the flag associated with the search term, along with a list of alternatives.

Parameters

  • term (String) – A place, person, organisation, etc

  • kind (String) – The kind of symbol that is being searched for (e.g flag, seal, or arms), defaults to flag

Returns

A list containing the title of the wikipedia page corresponding to the suggested flag, and a list of titles for suggested alternative pages

Return type

[String, [String]]

wiki_flags.getflagurl(pagename)¶

Given the name of a wikipedia page, returns a representitive image for that page. It can be safely assumed that, if the wikipedia page corresponds to a flag, the representitive image will be that flag

Parameters

pagename (String) – The name of a wikipedia page

Returns

The url of the representitive image for the page with name pagename

Return type

String

wiki_flags.getredirect(pagename)¶

Given a wikipedia page name, if the page name refers to a redirect, returns the name of the page that the redirect points to; Otherwise, returns the input

Parameters

pagename (String) – The name of a wikipedia page

Returns

The absolute name of the page pointed to by pagename

Return type

String

wiki_flags.isdisambiguation(pagename)¶

Given a wikipedia page name, returns True if that page is a disambiguation page and False otherwise

Parameters

pagename (String) – The name of a wikipedia page

Returns

True if pagename is the name of a wikipedia page in the ‘All disambiguation pages’ category, otherwise False

Return type

Boolean

wiki_flags.pageexists(pagename)¶

Given a page name, returns True if there is a page on wikipedia with that name.

Parameters

pagename (String) – The name of a wikipedia page

Returns

True if pagename is the name of a wikipedia page, False otherwise

Return type

Boolean

wiki_flags.selectflagpage(place, results)¶

Given a list of wikipedia page names, selects one with ‘flag’ or ‘coat of arms’ in the title and returns it

Parameters

  • place – The place who’s flag is being searched for

  • results ([String]) – A list of search results

Returns

The selected result

Return type

String

flaggart
